channel.title: Developing a web page?
channel.description:
inb4google
This is directed more towards people who have experience developing web pages such as cane and MBB.
How did you go about starting the development of a web page? Is it possible to get a free-domain where I could start doing so?
I'm asking so I can start early on my senior project which requires me to display a product and I think a web page would be a great way to do so.

item.title: Developing a web page?
item.dc:creator: @P_A_N_I_C P A N I C
item.description:
@P_A_N_I_C wrote:

Stupit:

When I just started using HTML, PHP, CSS, ect. I just used NOTEPAD++ and www.000webhost.com

000webhost is the best free offer you can find.
Free domain? .com .org etc.?

If so hosting24 has domains for 7$ a month.

Read full topic
